definition: preceding all others in time, the person who is head of state (in several countries), perform a work for the first time
details:
adjective
- preceding all others in time
= example: preceding all others in time
= synonyms: premiere
- first in rank or degree
= synonyms: prime
noun
- the person who is head of state (in several countries)
= synonyms: chancellor, prime minister
- the person who holds the position of head of the government in the United Kingdom
= synonyms: PM
verb
- perform a work for the first time
= synonyms: premiere
- be performed for the first time
= example: be performed for the first time
= synonyms: premiere
